message.raw:
Made heightfield more robust and fixed an over-active assert during dtor, inspired by:
[ 1804119 ] dIASSERT in with heightfield callback fails

Also, fixed demo_heightfield
 * call dGeomHeightfieldDataDestroy to correctly cleanup on exit
 * use dGeomSetPosition and dMassTranslate to fix trimesh mass (as in demo_moving_trimesh)
